SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlotto.model

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlotto.model.Event
public class Event extends Object
Represents an event in the application. This class serves as a data model mapped to the "events" collection in Firestore. It contains data such as the event title, description, capacity, time information (event window, registration window), and geolocation.
